content: I'm doing great, Kunal! I'm always ready to help and chat with you. I don't get tired or feel emotions, but I'm always happy to assist you with any questions or topics you'd like to discuss!

Kunal, I'm a virtual assistant, I don't have the ability to display images. However, I can describe an image or provide information about a specific topic. If you have a particular image in mind, feel free to describe it to me, and I'll do my best to help!
Any news related to india pakistan war..

Based on the search results I found, it appears that a ceasefire has been in effect since 5pm May 10 (which is about 14 hours ago, given the current time is 01:16:10 Sunday, 11 May 2025). However, there was a mention of a "gross violation" of the agreement by Pakistan, according to India's Foreign Secretary.
